user_story.i_want: record resolutions that change the Rules of the Co-op
user_story.so_that: change the way the co-op works

whens_list: I go to the Resolutions page
I press "Create a proposal"
I select "Change the Name of the organisation" from "Type of proposal"
I change the Name to "The Tea Co-op"
I press "Save this proposal as a draft"
thens_list: I should be on the Resolutions page
I should see a draft resolution "Change organisation name to 'The Tea Co-op'"

whens_list: I go to the Resolutions page
I press "Create a proposal"
I select "Change the Registered Office of the organisation" from "Type of proposal"
I change the Registered office address to "1 Main Street"
I press "Save this proposal as a draft"
thens_list: I should be on the Resolutions page
I should see a draft resolution "Change registered office address to '1 Main Street'"

whens_list: I go to the Resolutions page
I press "Create a proposal"
I select "Change the Objects of the organisation" from "Type of proposal"
I change the Objects to "buy all the tea."
I press "Save this proposal as a draft"
thens_list: I should be on the Resolutions page
I should see a draft resolution "Change objects to 'buy all the tea.'"

whens_list: I go to the Resolutions page
I press "Create a proposal"
I select "Change the Rules about membership criteria" from "Type of proposal"
I choose to allow "User" members
I choose to allow "Employee" members
I choose to disallow "Supporter" members
I choose to disallow "Producer" members
I choose to disallow "Consumer" members
I press "Save this proposal as a draft"
thens_list: I should be on the Resolutions page
I should see a draft resolution "Change the Rules to disallow Supporter Members"
I should see a draft resolution "Change the Rules to disallow Producer Members"
I should see a draft resolution "Change the Rules to disallow Consumer Members"

whens_list: I go to the Resolutions page
I press "Create a proposal"
I select "Change the Rules about share capital" from "Type of proposal"
I choose that Members hold one share only
I press "Save this proposal as a draft"
thens_list: I should be on the Resolutions page
I should see a draft resolution "Change the Rules to permit each Member to hold only one share"

whens_list: I go to the Resolutions page
I press "Create a proposal"
I select "Change the Rules about the composition of the Board" from "Type of proposal"
I enter "2" for each of the Board composition fields
I press "Save this proposal as a draft"
thens_list: I should be on the Resolutions page
I should see a draft resolution "Allow a maximum of 2 User Members on the Board"
I should see a draft resolution "Allow a maximum of 2 Employee Members on the Board"

whens_list: I go to the Resolutions page
I press "Create a proposal"
I select "Change the Rules about dissolution" from "Type of proposal"
I choose Common Ownership
I press "Save this proposal as a draft"
thens_list: I should be on the Resolutions page
I should see a draft resolution "Change the organisation to be a Common Ownership enterprise"
